name: Human
description: An adaptable and ambitious people found in every corner of the world.

lineages.name: Variant Human
lineages.description: Humans who gain versatility and a feat early in their career.

name: Elf
description: Graceful beings with long lifespans and a deep connection to magic and nature.

lineages.name: High Elf
lineages.description: Wielders of arcane might, hailing from refined elven societies.

lineages.name: Wood Elf
lineages.description: Stealthy forest dwellers attuned to nature.

lineages.name: Drow (Dark Elf)
lineages.description: Elves of the Underdark, known for their darkvision and innate magic.

name: Dwarf
description: Stout and resilient, renowned for their craftsmanship and loyalty.

lineages.name: Hill Dwarf
lineages.description: Hardy and wise, with a deep connection to the earth.

lineages.name: Mountain Dwarf
lineages.description: Strong and enduring, often found in alpine strongholds.

name: Halfling
description: Small and cheerful folk, known for their luck and stealth.

lineages.name: Lightfoot Halfling
lineages.description: Stealthy and sociable, able to hide behind larger creatures.

lineages.name: Stout Halfling
lineages.description: Hardier than most, with a resistance to poison.

name: Tiefling
description: Descendants of infernal heritage, marked by horns, tails, and fiendish magic.

lineages.name: Asmodian Tiefling
lineages.description: Born from pacts with Asmodeus, steeped in infernal power.

lineages.name: Fierna Tiefling
lineages.description: Seductive and charismatic, tied to the archdevil Fierna.

name: Dragonborn
description: Proud draconic humanoids with breath weapons and ancestral ties to dragons.

lineages.name: Chromatic Dragonborn
lineages.description: Descended from evil dragons, with elemental breath.

lineages.name: Metallic Dragonborn
lineages.description: Descended from noble dragons, champions of justice.
